name: Arvid Lindman
obverse: Bust of Arvid Lindman facing left.
reverse: A sun piercing through clouds. In the middle is a box with inscription.
description: Salomon Arvid Achates Lindman (19 September 1862 – 9 December 1936) was a Swedish rear admiral, industrialist and conservative politician who served as Prime Minister of Sweden from 1906 to 1911 and again from 1928 to 1930.
